pull.title: [RPC] trivial: gettxout no longer shows version of tx
pull.body: Since the switch to a per-txout chainstate db in #10195, the tx version information is no longer stored. Updated `gettxout` rpc help text accordingly.

events.message:
[RPC] trivial: gettxout no longer shows version of tx

Since the switch to a per-txout chainstate db in #10195, the tx version information is no longer stored. Updated `gettxout` rpc help text accordingly.

events.body:
utACK 8627946.

Funny, this is already mentioned in the release notes: https://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoin-devwiki/wiki/0.15.0-Release-notes-(draft)#low-level-rpc-changes
